RNS Number : 7991NSchroder Income Growth Fund PLC01 October 2021

1 October 2021

Investment in other listed closed-ended investment fund

Schroder Income Growth Fund plc (the "Company") announces that, in accordance with Listing Rule 15.6.8, as at close of business on 30 September 2021, it had a portfolio investment in 3i Group plc, a company which does not itself have an investment policy that limits its investments in other listed closed-ended investment funds to no more than 15% of its gross assets.
